description: Third column sequence of triangle A062138 (generalized a=5 Laguerre).
links: Index entries for sequences related to Laguerre polynomials
formula: E.g.f.: (1+14*x+21*x^2)/(1-x)^10.a(n)=A062138(n+2, 2) = (n+2)!*binomial(n+7, 7)/2!.If we define f(n,i,x)= sum(sum(binomial(k,j)*stirling1(n,k)*stirling2(j,i)*x^(k-j),j=i..k),k=i..n) then a(n-2)=(-1)^n*f(n,2,-8), (n>=2). [From _Milan Janjic_, Mar 01 2009]
maple: a:=n->sum(n-j, j=6..n)*n!/7!: seq(a(n), n=7..22); - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Apr 29 2007
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 19 2001
